limmen.business.services.implementations

Class TrackServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • limmen.business.services.implementations.TrackServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrackService

    @Service
public class TrackServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrackService
    Implementation of the TrackService interface, uses a repository for database interaction.
    Author:
    Kim Hammar on 2016-03-22.
